about_the_game:
Line Clipper: Tennis Tactics is a turn-based strategic tennis game. Zero in on your opponent’s pattern of play to predict their shots and gain the upper hand. Line up the perfect shot and simulate the outcome before committing to your next play. Sometimes the court is wide open, and sometimes you have to aim for the lines.

Create Your Own Playstyle:

Fine tune your strategy with custom playstyles that make it easy to construct points just the way you want.

Point Construction:

Points are broken into four repeating phases:
1. Aim: Adjust your aim, power, and spin to make sure you put your opponent on their back foot.
2. Recover: Move back to the center of the court or sneak up to the net as your opponent focuses on tracking down your shot.
3. Predict and Prepare: Predict your opponent’s shot and prepare your response. Better predictions and sticking to your prepared shot result in increased accuracy.
4. Move to shot: Balance court position, ball height, incoming speed, and more to find the best spot to take your next shot.
